content: Yes, there are many previous eras that people have expressed nostalgia for, and which may experience a resurgence in popularity in the near future. For example, the 90s have already started to become a popular reference point in fashion, music, and pop culture. Additionally, the 70s and 60s have also been revisited in various ways over the years, and some speculate that these decades may experience another resurgence in the future. However, it's important to note that trends are difficult to predict and can change quickly, so it's impossible to say for sure which specific historical eras will experience a resurgence in popularity.
